solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int findBottomLeftValue(TreeNode root) {--newline--        return findBottomLeftValue(root, 1, new int[]{0,0});--newline--    }--newline--    public int findBottomLeftValue(TreeNode root, int depth, int[] res) {--newline--        if (res[1]<depth) {res[0]=root.val;res[1]=depth;}--newline--        if (root.left!=null) findBottomLeftValue(root.left, depth+1, res);--newline--        if (root.right!=null) findBottomLeftValue(root.right, depth+1, res);--newline--        return res[0];--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
